Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Engine vibration level increase. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 05/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
